description: Model specification shared by all datasource adapters for `monitorMetric` input; also what is stored in a metric row's properties field

datasource.description: datasource adapter identifier; e.g., custom, cloudwatch

metricSpec.description: Datasource-adapter-specific metric specification; e.g., for custom datasource adapter, the metricSpec schema is defined in custom_metric_spec_schema.json

modelParams.description: Model creation parameter overrides for encoder min, max, and, minResolution only.

completeModelParams.description: Complete model params obtained from calling nupic.swarming.permutations_runner.runWithConfig() passing swarm config specifying timestamp and single scalar volume metric fields as well as 'TemporalAnomaly' inference type'

inferenceArgs.description: OPF Model Inference parameters (JSON object) for passing to the resulting model's `enableInference()` method as the `inferenceArgs` parameter.

timestampFieldName.description: The name of the field in modelParams corresponding to the metric timestamp; for example, this is c0 in the model params returned by nupic.frameworks.opf.common_models.cluster_params.getScalarMetricWithTimeOfDayAnomalyParams().

valueFieldName.description: The name of the field in modelParams corresponding to the metric value; for example, this is c1 in the model params returned by nupic.frameworks.opf.common_models.cluster_params.getScalarMetricWithTimeOfDayAnomalyParams().
